poem.title: Eels Boiled in Brew
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Lord Randall, quoth his true-love, Coating her hands in flour, Du must dein Leben Ã¤ndern; Picking the eels out one by one, Cutting throat and spine with scissors. You whit? It's Rilke: You must change your life. Rilke, is it? And what's for tea?
